GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
bpf: Don't use tnum_range on array range checking for poke descriptors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 4f672112f8665102a5842c170be1713f8ff95919, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit d2e4c1e6c2947269346054ac8937ccfe9e0bcc6b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: bpf: Don't use tnum_range on array range checking for poke descriptors
